notes: I2C power monitor, VIN+ VIN- differential inputs
Suggested synchronous buck, adjust to thermal needs
Low-IQ synchronous buck (alternate: MP1584 for higher current)
Low-ohm shunt; choose adequate power rating (e.g., 1% 1W)
Slow-blow or polyfuse per battery spec
Solar input transient suppression; pick standoff suitable for PV voltage
XT30/SM or screw terminal depending on PV connector choice
Bulk electrolytic or MLCC on VIN of regulators
